ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.refactorings.Refactoring

Packages that use Refactoring
Package
Description
ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core
The main entry package to Neo4j-Migrations.
ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.refactorings
Contains build-in refactorings.

  • Uses of Refactoring in ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core

    Methods in ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core with parameters of type Refactoring
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Counters
    Migrations.apply(Refactoring... refactorings)
    Applies one or more refactorings to the target (not the schema) database without recording any metadata and also without acquiring the lock.

  • Uses of Refactoring in ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.refactorings

    Subinterfaces of Refactoring in ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.refactorings
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    AddSurrogateKey
    This refactoring adds a surrogate key, either to all nodes matching one or more labels or to all relationships matching a given type.
    interface 
    CustomizableRefactoring<T extends CustomizableRefactoring<T>>
    A customizable refactoring.
    interface 
    ListToVector
    This refactoring allows converting vector properties that have been created with either db.create.setNodeVectorProperty or db.create.setRelationshipVectorPropert to the new actual vector property type available in Neo4j 2025.10.
    interface 
    Merge
    Refactoring that allows merging of entities.
    interface 
    MigrateBTreeIndexes
    Migrates existing B-tree indexes and constraints backed by such indexes to Neo4j 5.0+ and higher supported indexes.
    interface 
    Normalize
    Normalizes Graph properties.
    interface 
    Rename
    Renames entities or properties of entities.
